quote: Imagine if you knew someone who's going to remodel their home and they have a young child that has asthma. Now you get to be the one that says, 'Hey, I want to connect you with the Green Design Center.'
why_clipworthy: It provides a concrete example of how agents can add value by connecting clients with wellness resources.
suggested_hook: Want to be the go-to agent in your market? Here's how to add real value to your clients' lives.
